title: Drawing, 1917-4-83, July 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on buff-colored paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
inscribed: Inscribed by the artist with date in graphite, at lower center:  July 1853; inscribed by another hand across lower margin:  La Yglesia parroquial de ntro Sra de Chiquinquira del Cerrito / El parroco/ Jose Patricio Panedes
description: Horizontal oblique view  of the church at left; the three-storied steeple tower stands to the right and is flanked by a courtyard surrounded by a slat fence.
